headline: Infinity Flight Group Expands Its Training Fleet With 10 Additional Cessna Skyhawks, Boosting Training Capabilities for Future Pilots
summary: WICHITA, Kan., July 25, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT) company, today announced an agreement with Infinity Flight Group for the purchase of 10 additional Cessna Skyhawk aircraft, expected to be delivered in 2027. Infinity Flight Group has steadily expanded its fleet during the last three years, ordering a combined total of 35 new Cessna Skyhawks.

headline: Textron: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) — Textron Inc. TXT) on Thursday reported second-quarter profit of $245 million. On a per-share basis, the Providence, Rhode Island-based company said it had profit of $1.35.

headline: TXT Q2 Deep Dive: Mixed Margins Offset Revenue Growth Amid Defense Acceleration
summary: Aerospace and defense company Textron (NYSE:TXT) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 5.4% year on year to $3.72 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.55 per share was 7.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
